about_the_game:
LIBRARIAN LUST is a tantalizing visual novel that takes you deep into the shadowy, seductive corners of the Roxburial Library, a place where the pursuit of forbidden knowledge intertwines with unbridled desire. This story transports you into a world where ancient tomes hide more than just dusty secrets, and the mysterious librarian, Elor Dophner, isn't just a keeper of books but of forbidden fantasies.

Bridget and Vera, two curious researchers on a quest to delve into the lore of goblins, arrive at the legendary Roxburial Library—a place shrouded in mystery and arcane knowledge. They're eager to uncover hidden truths, but little do they know that their search for academic wisdom will soon be derailed by something far more primal.

At the heart of the library, they meet Elor Dophner, an eccentric, dangerously charismatic vampire librarian who is just as beguiling as the ancient volumes he guards. Drawn to his allure, the two women quickly find their scholarly pursuits taking a steamy detour. Elor, captivated by their beauty and thirst for knowledge, uses his supernatural charm to pull them into his world—a world where the boundaries between learning and lust, curiosity and carnal desire, blur beyond recognition.

As the night unfolds, Bridget, Vera, and Elor embark on a scandalous, erotic adventure amidst the towering bookshelves and ancient manuscripts. The once-quiet library transforms into the setting of a wild, unforgettable night of passion where knowledge and desire merge, and the heat of the moment overtakes all reason. Elor's seductive games lead to a sensual experience neither Bridget nor Vera could have anticipated, leaving them forever changed by their intimate encounter.

  • 🌟 High-Definition Renders: Stunning visuals that bring the characters and setting to life, immersing you in every sultry moment.

  • 📖 Intriguing Storyline: A gripping blend of ancient lore, dark seduction, and forbidden passions.

  • 🔞 Explicit Scenes: Dive deep into sensual, adult-themed interactions that explore the darker side of desire.

  • 🖐️ One-Hand Playability: Whether you’re captivated by the story or the steamy scenes, you can enjoy the game with one hand free.

Step into Roxburial Library and discover that some of the greatest secrets lie not in books, but in the desires we dare not speak of.

highlighted.name: It's time to taste her tits
Did your electric bill come due?

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains the following sexual content:
Explicit depictions of sexual acts, including consensual group sex.
 This game doesn't contains the following content: drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, suicide.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Librarian Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Bridget and Vera arrive at the famous Roxburial Library, hoping to uncover secrets about goblins for their research. However, the enigmatic librarian, Elor Dophner, has other plans.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
